scripts.prestart: npx kill-port 3000 || true && npx kill-port 3001 || true
scripts.start: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,blue "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run start:clean"
scripts.start:alt: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,blue "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run start:alt"
